comments.text: Because we will use 'http' scheme in this test for Fission. We need to enable the pref 'browser_blockingDOMCache.js' to allow it can use DOM cache in insecure context.
comments.raw_text: Because we will use 'http' scheme in this test for Fission. We need to enable the pref 'browser_blockingDOMCache.js' to allow it can use DOM cache in insecure context.

comments.text:
Created attachment 9149388
Bug 1637897 - Enable pref "dom.caches.testing.enabled" for the test 'browser_blockingDOMCache.js'. r?baku!


We need to enable this pref to allow the DOM cache in insecure context
when this test runs in Fission.
